
# UK Supreme Court RSS feeds (unofficial)

This repo publishes two RSS feeds to GitHub Pages:

- `latest-judgments.xml` – auto-generated from the Court’s **Latest judgments** page  
  <https://www.supremecourt.uk/news/latest-judgments>  <!-- [1](https://repository.law.uic.edu/abapreview/announcements.html) -->

- `future-judgments.xml` – auto-generated from the **News** page, filtered to the “Future judgments” category  
  <https://www.supremecourt.uk/news>  <!-- [2](https://www.supremecourt.gov/oral_arguments/argument_audio.aspx) -->

Feeds update daily via GitHub Actions.

**Disclaimer:** Unofficial. Use at your own risk. Check originals for accuracy.
``
